value.0:
The following book was actually comprised of a series of royal decrees and official proclamations.

--

Queen Anais Rhindaun and the Royal Council have decreed:

All monstrous races must be driven from the Crown-Lands and all Tethyrian holdings.

Monstrous races include, but are not limited to:
-Orcs, Goblins, Hobgoblins, Bugbears
-Ogres
-Trolls
-Driders
-Draconic Creatures
-Jellies, Puddings and other Slimes

Drow, Half-Orcs, and Tieflings BEWARE: You WILL be marked for higher scrutiny.  Disrespect our Laws at your peril.

Endorsed by: Queen Anais Rhindaun and the Royal Council

--

By order of the Helmite Inquisition, these additional creatures shall receive a bounty to be rewarded by the Crown.

-Hungry Undead
-Restless Undead
-Liches
-Werewolves
-Devils and Demons
-Extra-planar beasts of malicious intent

Endorsed by: Telvar Gwyveron, High Watcher and Abbeymaster of Chevangard of Survale Ford.

--

By order of the Council of Noromath, bounties will be offered for the following offenders of the law:

-Bandits
-Blighters
-Deserters
-Cyricists
-Occultists

Endorsed by: Lord Knight Marcus Ashcot,  Mayor of Brost Harlan Givens, Sir Willum Darbsy, Lady Margaret Aberdeen
Book: By Royal Decree: Expulsion of Monstrous Races
